short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never miss a free donation for your chosen charity! It just takes one click to activate the donation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A must have extension to help you raise money for your chosen charity!

This clever extension designed for your desktop or laptop, allows you to easily identify which retailers are able to offer a free donation, by means of a small reminder appearing when a retailer is participating. All you then have to do is click 'activate donation' and your shopping will raise a free donation. 

Online shopping through iStreet, enables you to generate a free donation for your chosen charity or good cause on every purchase - at no extra cost to you. Retailers are willing to give this donation as a thanks for sending a customer to their site,  don't miss out - it's such an easy way for you to make a difference.

We have thousands of major retailers signed-up, allowing you to purchase millions of products and raise endless amounts for your cause. 

Why add the extension:
-  It's free and easy to install
-  Absolutely no adverts
-  Raise up to 5x more for your cause
-  It's 100% secure
-  Thousands of retailers participating

On average retailers will donate 5% of your spend to your chosen charity, however this can vary anywhere from 1% up to 25%. It doesn't cost you a penny extra!


For more information about iStreet and to see our privacy policy please visit our website iStreet.org.uk
